item.title: Facts
item.description: INTRODUCTION Facts was released as the first box of HTB’s Season 10. It’s a well-designed box with little guesswork and good fundamentals; it makes for an excellent warmup for the rest of the season. Recon reveals two HTTP servers. The first is a website running Camaleon CMS, the other is a cloud storage utility called MinIO. Spending a few extra minutes on vulnerability research is a great idea for Facts - it’ll help you move very quickly later on.
